title: About Me

video.title: Introduction video about Milad Afkhami
video.desc: This is a short introduction video for Milad Afkhami to introduce him and his profession

p1: Hey, I'm Milad. I'm a 23 y.o. developer, mentor, student, and at late nights writer!
p2: I work at Ide-kavan Co. as front-end chapter lead, I am working in the front-end web development field since my early university years and I'm enjoying every bit of it.
p3: I grew up in Shahr-e-Rey, a district in the south of Tehran state.
p4: After spending my elementary and middle school, I got accepted for NODET and spent my high school there.
p5: After I was ranked 697 on the National entrance exam, I got accepted to study electrical engineering at Shahid Beheshti University
p6: I really didn't feel good about being an electrical engineer and after a couple of semesters, I changed my field to computer engineering at Islamic Azad University.
p7: I spend my free time reading, listening to music, watching tv shows, and enjoying time with my close friends.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.born_desc: Born and raised as a single child ...
timeline.earlySchool_desc: when I was 4, I took a test to see if I'm ready for school and I passed it! but I was even smaller than kids my age so my parents decided that I stick to the routine.
timeline.startingSchool_desc: Nothing special to say about this, like every other Iranian kid, I went to a school under a system that kill the creativity and happiness of students.
timeline.firstComputer_desc: My father bought a computer for my 10th birthday, Whoa!
timeline.choosingNationalExamPath_desc: I was hopelessly in love with Mathematics, I always dreamed my 40 y.o. version to be a bald skinny, not attractive professor who hates kids, but after putting all my efforts and love into learning it, I decided to concentrate on the national entrance exam.
timeline.university_desc: Endeavor paid off! I got accepted to study electrical engineering at Shahid Beheshti University, couldn't be happier but ...
timeline.tookCoupleOfSemestersOff_desc: I took a couple of semesters off to work on companies and professional teams.
timeline.changingField_desc: After one year of flip-flopping, I decided to change my field of study to computer engineering. I can't forget the hell my parents raised because of my decision.
timeline.firstDayAtWork_desc: As a night owl, I had a firm reason to hate that day and the days ahead, but my love for learning and competing, helped me keep going.
timeline.growingMyHair: This is when I started to grow my hair :)
timeline.leftMyFirstJob_desc: As time goes by, I realized it wasn't really anything to learn for me in that company, so I officially quit my first job
timeline.startingAtAppTech_desc: I found a good company to experience new challenges. I improved my React knowledge there and learned React Native.
timeline.startingAtArshCo_desc: After reaching a good knowledge of React, I decided to have a new challenge and work on larger projects and I chose Arsh Company to continue. despite my last superiors, they were really nice to me
timeline.becomingChapterLead_desc: I proved myself to headquarters in my challenges and became lead of the front-end development chapter.
timeline.ielts_desc: I passed my IELTS exam with a 7 score.
timeline.startingAtBehtarino: Starting at Behtarino Team - Ide-kavan Co.
timeline.startingAtBehtarino_desc:
After overcoming numerous big challenges in Arsh corporation, decided to leave the company for good regarding the lack of suitability between my abilities and expertises and their necessities.
As I preferred to work creatively employing multi-expertises, decided not to work with large companies though had satisfying offers.
As a result, I started working with Behtarino team at Ide-Kavan Company, a young Iranian startup, so can challenge myself by owning the recoding project of their websites's front-end.
timeline.becomingChapterLeadAtIdeKavan: Becoming Chapter Lead at Ide-Kavan(Owner of the Behtarino team)
timeline.becomingChapterLeadAtIdeKavan_desc:
Five months after I joined Behtarino team, I overcame to my starter challenge of recoding the whole behtarino website to reach sustainability and became front-end chapter lead at the company level(Ide-Kavan company).
My goal was to help the company bringing sustainability for other projects and help ~10 members of front-end chapter to level up everyday.
